graph.topic: Government should be responsible for education and health care or not?

nodes.text: government should fund the deprived for their health care and education
citizens available for the both should encourage the government to allocate money to more urgent areas
the harmonious society calls for the joint efforts of the government and citizens
it is the government that should be obligated to fund the health care and education for citizens
citizens enjoy the right to live in a harmonious and stable environment, which should be enabled by the government, the leader of the society
If citizens had no access to health care and education, their physical health and psychological soundness would be at risk
such people might fail to get cured in time, thus influencing their working efficiency, which would destabilize the production of the industry
without sufficient guidance of teachers, these citizens might misbehave or even commit crimes, posing a threat to other citizens' security
the government should be accountable for citizens' health care and education to keep society safe and stable
it is a waste of public money for the government to subsidize health care and education of each citizen in society
a great number of people, in fact, have had the capacity to pay for the both privately

the government should give priority to more pressing problems related to social members' wellbeing, such as soaring crime rate, AIDS epidemic or the shortage of infrastructure, which are requiring financial resources from the government to address
